Has anybody else noticed that we seem to be calming down on these boards? Some conversations are bordering on friendly? I'm glad for it. But why?
 
 Has every topic been thoroughly hashed?
 
 What's left is too picky even for us?
 
 Are we just burned out?
 
 Are the undecideds decided?
 
 Has the inevitabiity of Nov. 2 struck us?
 
 Please. Let this be over on Nov. 2 so we can go back to all being Americans again.

Has anybody else noticed that we seem to be calming down on these boards? Some conversations are bordering on friendly? I'm glad for it. But why?
 

 
 It's the cold, it freezes our brains to the point that we can't argue anymore :p

It's the cold, it freezes our brains to the point that we can't argue anymore :p

 
 It is ninety degrees here in Texas and I'm ready to argue. Could be that we're just a bunch of friendly people that like to swap views regardless of how inane and insipid some of the opinions seem to us. I try for a tone that is friendly and not cruel, since I feel nature has been cruel enough to some posters. I am constantly amazed at how intelligent and astute the posters that agree with me are, and I suspect that some of those that disagree with me are former brain donors. I enjoy and appreciate the art of the insult and I have been zapped by some experts in my time. Although I have mellowed over time like good whiskey, I still have a propensity to pi*s people off. So, in advance for future affronts some may take, I mean nothing personal and I might even like you, which could indicate something about my tastes.
 Dono
I think as the election gets closer, some people are getting a little nervous with the idea that their candidate might actually win. It's like the old saying, "Be careful what you wish for".

 Please. Let this be over on Nov. 2 so we can go back to all being Americans again.

 
 We're not all Americans here.

We're not all Americans here.
Join in anyway. We could offer you honorary citizenship - but I would be surprised if you declined. emoticon_xlove
